Texts.Eng: A centrifuge allows you to separate liquid from material, and more. There are ^orange;several types^reset; of these devices, but we'll start simple: build a ^orange;wooden centrifuge^reset; to get started.

While not incredibly effective, a wooden centrifuge is able to process basic liquids and grind up honeycombs to get at the goodies inside. As soon as possible, upgrade to an ^orange;Iron Centrifuge^reset; for far more utility.
